name: AstroSurfer

name: Space Bounce
description: We present you the hyper/super/duper/x-tra game, the boredom killer and the mental pain maker, Space Bounce. It's a simple game, with simple mechanics and a simple purpose: to score the highest score. All you have to do is to dodge the asteroids and the planets, and if you hit them, you will lose some hp (which is in the left of the screen), but if you do not you may conquer the Space!

The instructions are simple; you can jump between the white and the black dimension by using either "z" & "x", or the left and the right arrow keys. Pause with "p", restart a level with "r". You can also return to the title by pressing "t", when the game is paused.

name: Fate Chapter 2: The Beginning
description: Fate Chapter 2 is a psychological horror game with a playtime of about 5-6 hours. It includes many puzzles and gnarly scenes and is a single player game. In this game there is blood sexual content and strong language. There are many scenes of blood, dismembered people and much more.

name: Burrows
description:
After leaving behind his former life in 1920's New Orleans, a jaded possum named Grey finds himself thrown into an unending nightmare by the enigmatic bartender, Virgil. Lost in a churning sea of souls, Grey comes across a group of men somehow connected to his former home, a plantation replete with it's own dark history. Just as quickly as they find each other they're suddenly taken away, leaving Grey only one option:
Dive into their memories and find out what caused this in the first place.

Explore various locations throughout time such as 1960s New York, 1980s Los Angeles ect. and strengthen your bonds with friends new and old. Many choices will lie before you and the results will have high stakes. Virgil's game is a gamble and you're his bet. Will you play into his hand, try to return to your old life or forge a new future?

name: Crypto Raiders
description:
Raid dungeons, earn gear, and level up. Crypto Raiders is an NFT-based dungeon crawler on the Polygon network with a goal of being the biggest MMORPG NFT Game.

Go on quests, fight MOBs, do PvP, and more. Start your adventure today!

name: Rise of Empires: Ice and Fire
description: Rise of Empires: Ice and Fire is a real-time nation vs. nation medieval strategy war game. Join now! Your country needs you! The player will take on the role of a leader of a small town devastated by the invasion of the Eastern Dynasty. Build your empire once again from the ruins, train your troops, recruit legendary heroes and join your allies in the non-ending war. To befriend or to plunder, the choice is yours!

name: Sanctuary
description: Sanctuary is a Simulated-Projectile Real Time Strategy game set far in the future on a Dyson Sphere. Three factions vie for power on what could be a prosperous utopia but is instead a constant battleground. Players take command of thousands of units on large battlefields

name: Ise & Kai: Chosen Throne
description: How do you fulfill fate if it‚Äôs recorded wrong? Ise & Kai: Chosen Throne is an otome with an interesting take on the isekai genre, where you forge the destiny of the realm and fight to escape a predestined fate. Play as Seina Kaimana, a descendant of the realm's goddess, as she discovers there‚Äôs more to her prophesied fate.

You won't want to miss this riveting, new adventure that brings together your favorite series characters‚ÄîRimuru, Great Sage, Gobta, Shion, Shuna, Benimaru, Gabiru, and more‚Äîand introduces brand new ones!

name: Odysseus
description: You are Odysseus, a homesick, tired, and moribund pilgrim in a struggle to find meaning in life. Witness his journey and tragedy as he goes to a foreign city in the middle of winter in search of collecting money to continue traveling while meeting and helping all sorts of sad, broken people along the way.

name: CryptoCars

name: Doomer7
description: a Killer7 themed Doom mod

name: Mother of All Secrets
description:
Mother of All Secrets is an RPG of mythical intrigues and occult mysteries.

Become a young ward at an old and remote orphanage. Live your new life for fourteen days as the enigmatic masters of the House prepare you and your mates for the impending visit of the mysterious Guest. Every inhabitant of the orphanage has a history of their own, and the orphanage's little world holds many secrets and mysteries. Decide where to go, what events to participate in, which goals to pursue, and who you should influence. Will you be ready to learn the ultimate truth on the last night of your stay here?

Get ready to dive into the very heart of the events that unfold inside the orphanage's closed society. Hand-drawn graphics will immerse you into the reality of your new home.

name: NGL Biathlon
description: Brand new biathlon game

name: Opportunity
description: Opportunity is an atmospheric narrative game where you become the famous NASA rover and brave the many obstacles littering the desolate red planet in order to finally complete its mission.

name: NiftyVille
description: NiftyVille is a place where you get to be you. But the extraordinary is always just around the corner! Demolition Derbies, Races, Zombie Parties... anything can happen in the world's first play-to-earn open world game on the Ethereum network.

name: Ferrari Challenge: Trofeo Pirelli + Supercar Challenge

name: Werlocks.io
description: A battle royale style game where you plays as wizards who attack each other with spells. You can upgrade spells as the round progresses, and unlock new spells.

name: Ilum
description: Action open-world game that includes elements of exploration. Taking place in ancient Babylon and the surrounding region, including cities like Borsippa, Sippar, Kutha and Kish, among others. The year is 539 BC, the time when the Babylonian empire feel to the Persians and its Jewish captives released from servitude after 70 years. As prophesied, Babylon is to be destroyed. Ilum accurately depicts archaeological findings and cuneiform inscriptions from buildings such as the Tower of Babel, Hanging Gardens and Nebuchadnezzar's palaces. Voice-acted in Akkadian language in a Biblical and Babylonian mythological background.

name: Brick Game
description: Brick Game for Android a recreation of the classic handheld electronic game, which had many different models and manufacturers.

name: Faani
description:
A short narrative-driven game about the afterlife.

Many people that have experienced Coma said that was a totally different place, the geometries were special and they haven't seen such colors before. This game is my notion about how it looks. Who knows, maybe it is.

name: Holoearth

A new frontier awaits.
Holoearth is an open-world sandbox game based on hololive Alternative for PC and mobile devices.

name: Project Kafka
description: Inspired by the Persona series, Project Kafka is an interesting mix of hack n slash and dating sim about love, and death, with a healthy mix of humor that‚Äôs expected from the genre.

name: The Coneflower Dilemma
description: The Coneflower Dilemma is a blend of survival horror, first person action and adventure mechanics, with an eccentric gameplay loop. Inspired by RPG Maker games and other classics such as Killer7 and Resident Evil, the game features a mysterious story with touches of both surrealistic horror and comedic slice of life.

name: Beodara
description: Beodara is a game that takes place during the Middle Ages. You and your opponent will control a character who will be able to gather resources with different aims: build your village, hire peasants as well as knights and many other soldiers.

name: Master of Words
description:
Master of Words is an amazing word-construction game. Have fun and train your brain - at the same time!

Thousands of people from around the world play on the same board. By the end of every match, you can see the worldwide rankings and the progression of your skills.

name: Crush Zone: Demolition Derby
description: Crush Zone: Demolition Derby is a thrilling, action multiplayer, vehicular party game. Where drivers around the word enter and compete in the gladiatorial games for the grand prize.

name: Just Say the Word!
description:
A new take on a familiar board and parlor game. Fun, quick and easy! Play hands-free, no typing required, with only the sound of your voice. Everyone from 13 to 100 year olds will love it as though they were on their very own game show ‚Äì right on their own PC!

Each round, one team member becomes The Speaker, whose mission is to make their team say as many of The Words as possible, without using any of the Forbidden Words! Can you describe a Unicorn without mentioning ‚Äúhorn‚Äù, ‚Äúmythical‚Äù or ‚Äúfantasy‚Äù? What about ‚Äúshark‚Äù without ‚Äújaws‚Äù, ‚Äúbite‚Äù or ‚Äútornado‚Äù?

name: Ankhesenamun's Histories
description:
Play as the scholar Ankhesenamun that has taken on the daunting task of following the footsteps of the great Historian Herodotus.

Explore the worlds unknown to humans and meet the most surreal life forms, while our adventurous scholar uncovers the secrets of these fascinating realms...
